p.d: We Love MMA, the ultimate combat sport, is one of the best known and successful Mixed Martial Arts series in Europe. Since its inception in 2010 in Berlin the MMA series of tournaments has been drawing huge crowds of fans to the biggest arenas in the country. The 2018/19 We Love MMA season has kicked off with an event (WLMMA 41) in the Carl Benz Arena in Stuttgart on September 29.
